WRITING.TEXT:
Some of my worst binges have been on "healthy" foods like a bowl with a serving of blueberries, fat free yogurt and granola mixed in for crunch. And then it's so fucking delicious the bowl just keeps magically refilling itself over and over. *and over*
So much for serving sizes when I taste that shit.

Same. I am very much an all or nothing person. I can't have "a small snack" during the day to ward off hunger pangs, or it will trigger a "EAT ALL THE THINGS" compulsion so I have found that eating once, at night, is the only way I can exist.
Needless to say, maintenance didn't work out so well for me in the traditional sense. My attempts at maintaining have mostly been me eating normal amounts for 2-3 days, losing control and binging for 2-3 days and then feeling absolutely guilty and restricting/fasting for days/weeks to punish myself. This is the cycle I have been in since the start of the year. It's great! ahahahakillme
But everyone is different so don't let me and my lack of control discourage you, OP.

Okay I'm probably 98% caffeine at this point but seriously, this is my day. I wake up at 5 am-ish, if I slept at all, and have one standard size mug of coffee with a Stok shot and grab a Rockstar out of the fridge to take meds with. Sit down and dick around on my phone, drink coffee (2-3 mugs) until it's time to start getting ready for work. Drink Rockstars and coffee all day while at work - usually 2-3 more mugs of coffee. Get home at whatever time, make another pot of coffee. Drink more coffee and til I eat my dinner. Eat my meal o' the day, take my sleep meds, wait for them to work or not, sleep maybe and repeat.
I know I drink 3 Rockstars a day most days, but the coffee fluctuates wildly between 4-5 cups a day and a million lol. I honestly don't even know if caffeine affects me all that much anymore. I just really love black coffee.

*raises hand*
I'm slowly starving to death but hey, I hit my protein macros several times a week so I am *totally* healthy!
I take all these herbal supplements and vitamins and stuff like that's going to balance it out the longterm nutritional neglect ahaha.

such as Lana from Archer
I have nothing useful to add here, just wanted to say yessss on the Archer reference. Archer is life and Lana is badass. [Lanaaaaaa](https://youtu.be/wSGU4ND_v_E)

LOL me too. The only weird non-ED person message I've ever gotten was from a kind stranger telling me I should love myself. Well, thanks concerned stranger but that ship has sailed. (sailed, veered off course, crashed and plummeted to the ocean floor!)

I hate when anyone catches me eating, period. It could be the only thing I've eaten in 48 hours and I still feel like I got caught being fat. Like gtfo, I'm in my hour long process of making food love to this Quest bar. I don't need witnesses.

Cheaters gonna cheat. If you were the most flawless peep on the planet, a cheater would still cheat...so this ain't on you, babe. Ditch that zero!
I know it still hurts and we feel like it's because of some flaw of our own that makes our partner stray if they do, but you are worth so much more and he's a filthy scrub so you keep your head high and use this pain as fuel. Fuck cheaters.

My dogs actually have so many nicknames, I barely ever call them their real names anymore. It's kind of ridiculous. Even their ID tags mostly have their nicknames instead of their actual names lol.
I have a bad habit of nicknaming everyone and everything, tbh. My boss, oh lord haha, he's listed as Ham Fists on my phone. Hope he never sees that lol. We call one of our customers Nancy High Pockets because she wears her pants up to her freakin' sternum and I almost accidentally called her that to her face last week. Oops!

I'm an asshole so I would legit devote the next 72 hours of my life plotting out the *perfect* revenge. (But I also have untreated ADHD so I would probably get distracted halfway through my plotting and just end up acting like nothing ever happened because I forgot.)
What a twat, though... seriously. Sorry she said that.

I nicknamed my dogs Needy Gonzales and Emosabe (she gets mopey when she isn't physically attached to me). I have also been known to call the old one John Squincy Adams when he gives me the stinkeye, or Grumbledore (what up, HP fans!) when he's talking smack. But as far as nicknaming myself?!? I have no idea.
I am in constant motion so I guess maybe Twitch? I dunno. Or my username is pretty accurate lol.
One of my coworkers calls me Tiny Dancer when he catches me losing my shit with my earbuds in and I think I'm alone, but I wouldn't necessarily call it dancing so I think that one's out.

Welcome!
Sorry about your friend. I understand that too well, and it's a sadness that never truly heals. My best friend since childhood, who knew everything, passed unexpectedly a few years back and I miss her so much every single day. I have dealt with an ED since I was young, and she as well, and it was just so comforting to have her friendship. I never had to explain why I just *couldn't* eat something with her, or why I was having a bad day if I weighed a pound more or any of the other ED inspired traumas we fight with daily. She was the one friend who got it, who I didn't feel pressured into faking "normal" around. And she totally understood if I bursted into tears over a cookie. Her ED was compulsive overeating/BED so her struggles were different than mine, but we still understood. We just both had seriously effed up issues with food, and there was no judgement. And I mean, it wasn't just the food things that made us so close. We both dealt with anxiety and mood disorders, shitty family issues, etc. We shared the same twisted sense of humor, hobbies...ugh, I miss her.
I wish I could say that loss feels better after time, but I still feel it like it happened yesterday. My heart goes out to you. I journal to my friend when it gets overwhelming. I just write like she will be able to read it and it helps sometimes. I'm not religious so I don't believe in God or Heaven, but I just pretend she can read it and it helps.
Hugs.

I am so sorry you are going through all of this. I know when I'm feeling like a piece of shit, nothing anyone says can get through to me, but please just know that I, a complete stranger on the internet, owes a lot to you and I think you are an amazing person. You are bright, enthusiastic, compassionate, empathetic to everyone else's struggles while minimizing your own, and amazingly kind. You always tell people how beautiful they are, and compliment them, and build them up when they are tearing themselves down. You made one such reply to one of my posts recently when I was feeling super horrible about myself and it just hit me in the feels. You made my day.
Anyways, I ramble a lot because communication is not my strongest skill. But I think you're awesome, beautiful and kind...please don't be too hard on yourself. 3
Sent!
Sent!
Sent!
Sent!
Sent!

I order ephedra powder (called Mu Huang where it is grown) from a site where I buy all of my other botanicals. I hate going to the pharmacy to buy Bronkaid because it makes me so anxious that one day someone at the counter is going to say "Oh you can't buy that because you bought some this month already" and then they'll think I'm making meth with it or something lol. Idk, anxiety yay. Also I just prefer to buy things in their natural state when possible. Ya know, because it's healthier and I'm into that. (also a fucking lie ha!)
It's cheaper and I don't have to deal with human interaction when purchasing online so 10/10 recommend going that route if you're like me.
Thank you so much. Your posts are always so thoughtful and kind. 3

I've been maintaining and I hate it. I feel like I'm quadrupling in size by the minute. The bloat and water weight is dreadful. Can't say I'm at all interested in continuing to maintain. And I feel a total loss of control over my life, my anxiety, my motivation etc this week which makes me even more determined to just go back to restricting. Everything else just seems to fall into place when my focus is restriction.
So [here](http://imgur.com/xo8gI27) I am today. Me and my fluffy little work buddy. This morning's weight was 93 lbs. I need to update my flair but that feels like I'm accepting it and I'm not lol.

Thank you! They feel like flubber right now, lol/cry. I need to do a million squats.
And this silly pupper would totally love to be smothered in kisses. Affection from humans is her favorite thing ever.
Aw, thank you! 3

Feeling soft and squishy today, blah. I have a stupid stress fracture in my heel that refuses to heal and I'm on a steroid for inflammation which makes me want to eat my goddamn house. Yuck!
Anywho, [thigh check](http://m.imgur.com/II1xtCZ) and [arm hand wrist check](http://imgur.com/06WxMCm) with bonus doggo for cuteness!

Omg, you basically just wrote my own reply for me. All of this is so accurate. The GW thing ... Like, I never know how to answer that because there IS no magic number where I will suddenly feel better. I feel so ugly inside and out and no number on the scale will change that.
My ED was never about the weight or how I look but more about the torture of it. The loss is important only because it is tangible proof that I am accomplishing the goal of depriving myself.

This is the life I dream of. Oh and I need a million dollars, and a new treadmill so I could run inside. I'd just stay in my house, with my dogs and isolate myself from the world while binge watching Netflix and ordering stuff off of Amazon.
Ah yes.

It's a form of punishment. It started as a way to punish myself. For being ugly, for being fat, for being hated, for being a bad person, etc and it just spiraled from there. At first, I wanted it to kill me. I genuinely felt like suicide by gun or overdose was too quick, I wanted to suffer. So I thought giving in to the ED and starving to death would be the perfect torture.
Over time it became my coping mechanism and I really don't know how to get through life without it anymore. The obsession with watching the number drop, the counting of calories, the feeling of my bones, the mental planning of everything consumed...it keeps my mind busy so the depression and anxiety of life and the monsters of my past don't overwhelm my brain. I don't necessarily want to die anymore, though I know that's the finish line for my ED...oh the irony.

I ate a bunch of junk on Wednesday (birthday, yay) so now I feel flabby as hell. But I'm feeling okay about [my legs](http://m.imgur.com/bxnCftn) today so I'll share that photo and call it good until I don't feel like a bloated hippo lol.

Oh wow, I could've written this post. I had to stop buying them because, like you, bars were becoming the only thing I would eat. At first they were a miracle food for me - some way to ensure I was getting protein and nutrition in a tidy little pre-measured package I could just grab and go. No muss, no fuss. But over time I went cravings crazy for them and I literally couldn't stop thinking about when I was allowed my next one.
Pretty sure crack is in like the top five ingredients of those things.

Welcome from another control freak/tattoo lover.
I agree with just riding it out as best as you can until you graduate and aren't under such scrutiny. And as far as your Dr forcing you into inpatient, pretty sure that unless you're a minor, that takes a huge amount of legal hoop-jumping for anyone to be able to force an adult into a treatment they don't want. Like, you'd have to be on the verge of death and declared mentally incapable of making your own choices.

Walden Farms makes a calorie free/fat free/carb free line of salad dressings and that's what I use, but...if you've never tried their dressings, don't go into it thinking you're eating Kraft or Hidden Valley lol. They are thinnish, have a vinegary tone to them and aren't overly delicious BUT for zero evil, I have grown to quite like them.
You can find them in various grocery stores or online Amazon, EBay, etc.

I think I get what you mean. I'm at my lowest weight in yearrrrs and it's just like "meh, whatever." There is no happiness about it because at this point I don't really even have a goal weight. I am in search of a feeling I guess. Like maybe one day I'll wake up and just be okay with myself. But yeah, I know that's not really gonna happen either because I'm fugly on the inside too so like, wtf am I even doing? LOL. Ahhhh gotta love that inner voice that says nothing is ever good enough.
But congrats on your progress. Go get that piercing!

(Other idea was to give it to my mother because it's Mothers Day here in the UK, but she let my tiny precious floofy indoor cat outside this morning, so she gets NOTHING)
I don't know why but this cracked me up so hard lol. Maybe give her *one* and then let her know that she missed out on more because she failed Fluffkins.
Also, I hide my binge foods too. My roommate has been threatened with bodily harm if he gives me any of my "cheat" food outside of acceptable times. Basically I can go say "Hey, I want this or that" one time a day and he'll dig out whatever pre-portioned junk item I want. Right now I'm on a peanut butter kick and I know if I knew where that container of peanut butter pretzel bites was hidden, I'd eat the whole damn thing. You're amazing for not mauling all those chocolate bars! Not sure I could resist temptation like that right now.

Is she mentally ill or just an asshole?
Sorry you have to deal with that. Don't let her words get to you. She's obviously lashing out at you because she is insecure and that reflects on her attributes, not yours.
Hugs, keep your chin up. 3

No, because honestly this stupid disorder already controls so many aspects of my life and it's overwhelming af to deal with *my* fucking issues. I also tend to absorb and internalize emotions of those I am close to, so it would end up feeling like I was disordered x 2. Plus when I actually do allow myself to be close and care about another person, I am a fixer by nature and I'd devote all of my efforts to them and their health and lose any sight of my own. Which I mean hello irony lol like my own health has mattered jack shit for a while now.
I just imagine that I'd be a shitty partner for them, either way. It says nothing about them having an ED, but everything about my ability to cope with anything at all like a normal fucking human.
I'm so sorry. That sounds so suffocating and intrusive. :(

I sound like a broken record but damn, egg white omelettes are like, my only safe meal anymore. I add cheese, bacon crumbles, spinach, jalapeos and any other chopped veggies I am feeling and then top with salsa. It's around 225 calories and I'm full and energized foreverrr from it.
I also love my Chobani 0 yogurt. My latest obsession is finding super low cal foods that taste good and have decent amounts of protein, because I've started running again and I'm trying not to be a weak piece of shit lol.

I do this all the time because food packaging can be so misleading! I bought a "serving size" package of trail mix one time that said it was 1 serving and had the weight of the serving size (40 grams) listed. When I weighed it, it was 54 grams. That extra 14 grams added almost 70 additional calories. So now I'm paranoid and weigh everything.
